name: Edwin and Anita Lee Newcomer School
description: Edwin and Anita Lee Newcomer School is now CO-LOCATED with Gordon J. Lau Elementary School at 950 Clay Street, San Francisco - Chinatown Edwin and Anita Lee Newcomer School (formerly the Chinese Education Center) is a school for Chinese-speaking, newly-arrived immigrant students. It is a transitional, one-year program designed to teach foundational English skills in reading, writing, and oral English language development.
